task.instruction: Your email is dorothy.clark@systems.io. You would like to update the format of the template with the name 'Blog Post Template 18' to wiki and the content same as that of parent of the page with id 408. You would like to add label named 'enhancement' to the page with id 157. You would also like to delete the page who is child of the page with id 4

output.name: Blog Post Template 18
output.description: Blog post template for technical articles, product announcements, thought leadership, and company updates with engaging structure.
output.content:
# Blog Post Template

## Article Information
- **Title:** [Compelling headline that captures reader attention]
- **Author:** [Author name]
- **Date:** [Publication date]
- **Category:** [Technology/Product/Company News/Industry Insights]
- **Tags:** [Relevant tags for discoverability]
- **Estimated Reading Time:** [X minutes]

## SEO Metadata
- **Meta Description:** [150-160 character summary for search engines]
- **Featured Image:** [Description of main image]
- **Alt Text:** [Accessibility description for featured image]

## Article Structure

### Introduction
Start with a hook that grabs the reader's attention. Introduce the topic and explain why it matters to your audience. Set expectations for what the reader will learn.

### Main Content

#### Section 1: [Main Point 1]
Develop your first key point with:
- Clear explanations
- Relevant examples
- Supporting data or research
- Visual elements (images, charts, code snippets)

#### Section 2: [Main Point 2]
Continue with your second key point:
- Build on previous concepts
- Provide actionable insights
- Include real-world applications
- Use subheadings for scanability

#### Section 3: [Main Point 3]
Conclude your main arguments:
- Summarize key takeaways
- Address potential questions
- Provide implementation guidance
- Link to additional resources

### Code Examples (if applicable)
```
// Include relevant code snippets with:
// - Clear comments
// - Proper formatting
// - Context explanation
```

### Visual Elements
- **Screenshots:** [Description of relevant screenshots]
- **Diagrams:** [Technical diagrams or flowcharts]
- **Infographics:** [Data visualization elements]

### Conclusion
Summarize the main points and their significance. Provide clear next steps for readers. End with a call-to-action that encourages engagement.

### Further Reading
- [Related article 1]
- [Related article 2]
- [External resource 1]
- [Documentation link]

## Engagement Elements

### Discussion Questions
1. What has been your experience with [topic]?
2. How would you implement this in your organization?
3. What challenges do you foresee?

### Call-to-Action
- Subscribe to our newsletter
- Follow us on social media
- Share your thoughts in comments
- Try our product/feature

## Author Bio
[Brief author bio with expertise and background relevant to the topic]

## Publication Checklist
- [ ] Content reviewed for accuracy
- [ ] Grammar and spelling checked
- [ ] Links tested and working
- [ ] Images optimized and credited
- [ ] SEO elements completed
- [ ] Social media snippets prepared
- [ ] Publication scheduled
